Name: Battle Imagine - Goblin King
Description:
Use to activate or upgrade Goblin King's Battle Imagine skill: Arcane! Goblin Grand March.

Arcane! Goblin Grand March
Resonate with the power of Boss: Goblin King, summoning 1 to 3 goblins at random to cast skills.
Always summons 1 random goblin from Elite: Goblin Swords and Elite: Goblin Crossbow.
Has a chance to additionally summon 1 Elite: Jungle Goblin Warrior.
Has a chance to additionally summon 1 from Elite: Hurricane Goblin Giant Axe or Boss: Wind Goblin King. Has a 30% chance to summon the Boss.

Description2$english: A crystallization of thoughts, consciousness, and Engram, possessing supernatural power. This principle has not been unraveled since the Bapharian civilization.
